title: What kind of heavy metal is the best? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you don’t know the answer to this question (i.e., “What heavy metal do I enjoy?”), then NOBODY ON THIS GREEN EARTH is going to know the answer either. How is anybody supposed to read your mind? Why are you even incinerating Quora’s bandwidth with such an unanswerable question?

When it comes to the best musical genre or artist, I don't think I'm able to answer for everyone Do you love history?, then perhaps you'll love Iron maiden or Sabaton Do you love medieval/celtic music and mythology?, then perhaps the answer would be Folk Metal Hip Hop and Metal hybrid?, New Metal I guess … I could go on and on forever, you should keep searching untill you find what you're looking for, and if that's the case you could also try asking again but this time with more details such as your interests
